patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell coffee and tea
We have coffee and tea

Tunatoa kahawa na chai

patterns: Can I pay using a USSD?
Can I pay using my phone?
responses: We accept MPesa, USSD, and Cash payments only
Tunapokea MPesa, USSD na hela za mkononi
Traveling takes 20 - 40 min depending on the destination
Usafirishaji unachukua chini ya saa moja kulingana na safari
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
I ate a clock yesterday, it was very time-consuming.
Kwa nini kuku alivuka barabara? Kwenda upande mwingine!
Kwa nini nyani alicheka? Aliona ndugu yake kwenye kioo!

patterns: how can I book a vehicle
I would like to book a matatu
how do I book a matatu
responses: Please provide details of your trip: Book from <Location A> to <Location B>.
To book a matatu provide details of your trip: Book from <Location A> to <Location B>.

patterns: mtu anaweza weka nafasi ya gari kwa njia gani
responses: Tafadhali toa maelezo ya safari yako: Nafasi Kutoka <Eneo A> hadi <Eneo B>.
Ili kuweka nafasi yako kwenye gari, toa maelezo ya safari yako: Nafasi Kutoka <Eneo A> hadi <Eneo B>.

Can I get an OTP on this phone number?

patterns: What is the process for transferring funds?
How to initiate a transfer request?
How to transfer money from one fleet to another?
responses: To initiate a transfer, simply type 'Transfer {amount} from {source_fleet} to {destination_fleet}'. For example, 'Transfer 500 from sm34 to sm45'.

patterns: Ni mchakato gani wa kutuma fedha?
Jinsi ya kuanzisha ombi la ubadilishaji?
Jinsi ya kutuma pesa kutoka kikosi kimoja hadi kingine?
responses: Ili kuanzisha ubadilishaji, andika tu 'Peleka {amount} kutoka {source_fleet} hadi {destination_fleet}'. Kwa mfano, 'Peleka 500 kutoka sm34 hadi sm45'.

patterns: Transfer for me ksh {amount} from {source_fleet} to {destination_fleet}
Transfer ksh {amount} from sm{source} to sm{destination}
Transfer ksh {amount} from sm{source} to se{destination}
Transfer ksh {amount} from se{source} to sm{destination}
Transfer ksh {amount} from se{source} to se{destination}
Transfer {amount} from sm{source} to sm{destination} fleet
Transfer {amount} from sm{source} to se{destination} fleet
Transfer {amount} from se{source} to sm{destination} fleet
Transfer {amount} from se{source} to se{destination} fleet
responses: {DYNAMIC}

patterns: How do I recover money sent to the wrong fleet?
What if I sent money to the wrong fleet number?
How to recover funds sent incorrectly?
Recovery information for wrong fleet transfer
How to get back money sent to wrong fleet?
responses: To recover money sent to the wrong fleet, simply type 'Recover {amount} from {wrong_fleet} to {correct_fleet}'. For example, 'Recover 500 from sm34 to sm45'.

patterns: Ninavyoweza kurejesha pesa zilizotumwa kwa kikosi kisichosahihi?
Kama nilituma pesa kwa nambari ya kikosi isiyo sahihi, ninachofanya?
Jinsi ya kurejesha fedha zilizotumwa vibaya?
Maelezo ya kurejesha pesa zilizotumwa kwa kikosi kisichosahihi
Ninavyoweza kupata pesa zilizotumwa kwa kikosi kisichosahihi?
responses: Ili kurejesha pesa zilizotumwa kwa kikosi kisichosahihi, andika tu 'Rejesha {amount} kutoka {wrong_fleet} hadi {correct_fleet}'. Kwa mfano, 'Rejesha 500 kutoka sm34 hadi sm45'.
